snippet.title: Game Of Earth Gameplay Android / iOS
snippet.description:
Game Of Earth by PIXIO (ANDROID/iOS/iphone/ipad)
►►► SUBSCRIBE PROAPK FOR MORE GAMES : http://goo.gl/dlfmS0 ◄◄◄
For too long, the top one percent has flourished and the others did not. We need change, and the change is NOW!

Welcome to the Game of Earth!

You are the president of Earth 2.0. You can make this world a better place under your rule. Anyone would dream of being in your place because you wield the unlimited power to make the world great again.

You will make wise and timely decisions, fund and invest in projects that would allow your world to flourish. 

Only you know how to outwit those climate change deniers and greedy capitalist to keep your world growing because you are the commander in chief.

You will determine the course of the world for many, many years to come. You will face challenges. You will confront hardships. But for better or worse, YOU will lead the world.

Determine your approach to each of balancing clean air, citizen growth, and your treasury funds.
Make critical decisions!
Weave plots and unravel conspiracies!
Prevent revolution and bankruptcy!

Glorify yourself in the history of your world for generations to come!

DOWNLOAD

App Store: Coming soon
Play Store: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.pixio.google.red&hl=en

Total Size : 68 Mb

✔ LOOKING FOR MORE RPG GAMES?  ►►► https://goo.gl/wqCfuv ◄◄◄

----------------------------------------------------
SUBSCRIBE PROAPK TO DISCOVER MORE NEW ANDROID/iOS GAMES : http://goo.gl/dlfmS0
TWITTER: http://twitter.com/Apkno1
FACEBOOK: https://www.facebook.com/proapk4u
G+ : https://plus.google.com/+proapk

IF YOU LIKE OUR WORKS, PLEASE SUPPORT AND LIKE/ SHARE/ COMMENT ON OUR VIDEOS, THANK YOU!
